content: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>  <reference anchor='RFC2164'>  <front> <title abbrev='X.500/LDAP Directory to Support MIXER'>Use of an X.500/LDAP directory to support MIXER address mapping</title> <author initials='S.' surname='Kille' fullname='Steve Kille'> <organization>Isode Ltd.</organization> <address> <postal> <street>The Dome</street> <street>The Square</street> <street>Richmond</street> <street>TW9 1DT</street> <street>England</street></postal> <phone>+44-181-332-9091</phone> <email>S.Kille@ISODE.COM</email></address></author> <date year='1998' month='January' /> <area>Applications</area> <keyword>ITU directory service protocol</keyword> <keyword>directory</keyword> <keyword>lightweight directory access protocol</keyword></front>  <seriesInfo name='RFC' value='2164' /> <format type='TXT' octets='16701' target='http://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc2164.txt' /> <format type='XML' octets='17126' target='http://xml.resource.org/public/rfc/xml/rfc2164.xml' /> </reference>
